name: Habeas Corpus (Grim 👁️)
description:
Made for #subQjam using the theme of "ENVIRONMENT" within 1,000 words.  Explore the abandoned spaces in the bowels of a wandering fortress; accept or resist its perpetual motion.

  • 🚪 Navigate from room to room using the buttons in the top bar.
  • 🚪 Multiple endings.
  • 🚪 Compatible with small screens and mobile play.
